=== Indonesian Ubuntu Users Groups ===

* Founded      : July, 10th 2005
* Web site     : http://www.ubuntu-id.org , http://ubuntulinux.or.id
* Forum        : http://forum.ubuntulinux.or.id
* Mailing list : http://groups.google.com/group/id-ubuntu
* IRC`s        : irc.dal.net #id-ubuntu , irc.freenode.net #ubuntu-id
* Email        :  , 
* staff        : <nowiki>[[AMuammar|Ahmad Muammar]]</nowiki>, AndiDarmawan

=== Target ===

* To spread the Ubuntu's spirit to all people in Indonesia
* To give the local support to Indonesian Users
* To provide the place to Indonesian Users that they can use for discussion, sharing information, and having fun.
* To organize events and to represent Ubuntu in local conferences in Indonesia
* To involve in Ubuntu Project like on packaging, localization and documentation
* Strengthen Ubuntu brand in Indonesia in business, education and goverment

=== Activity ===

* Distributing Ubuntu Repositories in DVD (For some people who has slow Internet connections)
* Attending and Promoting Ubuntu in various Conferences (https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ConferenceAppearances?highlight=(Indonesia))
* Translating Ubuntu into Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia)
* Helping new Ubuntu users via mailing list
